Container: New page for TeknikFokus is up and running! The page will present news regarding TeknikFokus 2020
Website for companies attending has been updated. Filter system implemented.
While the website is under review, the filter system has been disabled to prevent unsolicited results.

Header: Companies attending Teknikfokus 2020 has been published!
Container: The team is proud to present the list of companies attending the Teknikfokus 2020 fair. Be sure to look through the list under 'Attending'!
Lunch lecture with Siemens has been published! The event is to take place the 3rd of February, 12:15am-1pm at LTH, hall E:B. More info at: https://www.facebook.com/events/2565615360428088/
